timeline.message:
Fix Shared Database Tests

Fix FieldChangeEvent Delta computation

timeline.author: tobiasdiez

timeline.bodyText: How is the delta value used? Maybe we need to calculate the actual difference between the strings here? I.e. the delta of aaaa and aabb is 2 and not 4
timeline.author: tobiasdiez

replies.author: Siedlerchr

replies.bodyText: Ok, thanks for looking this up. Then I would propose to replace delta by isMajorChange.
replies.author: tobiasdiez

timeline.message:
